name: Sealed Weapon Receptacles

items.alias: Sealed Weapon Receptacle  - Alsaqri Chemical Rifle
Ithaca Ki12 Vulture Custom Super A

raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ A Sealed Weapon Receptacle (ie : #L "Sealed Weapon Receptacle - Alsaqri Chemical Rifle" "157670" #L "Hacker Tool" "87814" The Missing Part... ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ The first thing to do is to pry open the Sealed receptacle to get the unfinished weapon. Hacker Tool + Sealed Weapon Receptacle = Unfinished Weapon Skills: | BE | ------------------------------ Next, you must apply to the Unfinished Weapon the required missing Part. Here is the list of all theses parts: #L "Unfinished Alsaqri Chemical Rifle" "157668" + #L "Self-Repairing Ultra-X" "137284" = #L "Alsaqri Chemical Rifle" "157661" Skills: | WS | ------------------------------ #L "Unfinished HSR Explorer 661" "157674" + #L "Generic Magnetic Propulsion System" "137246" = #L "HSR Explorer 661" "157666" Skills: | WS | ------------------------------ #L "Unfinished IMI Tellus TT" "157646" + #L "Flake Tubing Super-Coolant System" "137250" = #L "IMI Tellus TT" "157628" Skills: | WS | ------------------------------ #L "Unfinished Ithaca Ki12 Vulture" "162907" + #L "Nano-Interfaced Cooling System" "137270" = #L "Ithaca Ki12 Vulture" "162902" Skills: | WS | ------------------------------ #L "Unfinished River Seasons XP" "162937" + #L "Ultra Short Composite Barrel" "137232" = #L "River Seasons XP" "162933" Skills: | WS | ------------------------------ #L "Unfinished Soft Pepper Pistol" "157656" + #L "Nano Pylon" "137278" = #L "Soft Pepper Pistol" "157644" Skills: | WS | ------------------------------ #L "Unfinished Sol Chironis Systems" "157652" + #L "Energy Pack Interface" "137258" = #L "Sol Chironis Systems" "157635" Skills: | WS | ------------------------------ For the Last one, it's a bit more subtle since you have four possibilities #L "Unfinished Summer SMP" "157452" + #L "Triple Pulse Enabler" "137298" = #L "Summer Burst SMP" "157286" Skills: | WS | ------------------------------ Unfinished Summer SMP + #L "Gyro Stabilizing Unit" "137296" = #L "Summer FA SMP" "157292" Skills: | WS | ------------------------------ Unfinished Summer SMP + #L "Rapid-Reload-And-Fire Gyro" "137314" = #L "Summer Fling SMP" "157289" Skills: | WS | ------------------------------ Unfinished Summer SMP + #L "Shells Magazine" "137260" = #L "Summer Shells SMP" "157295" Skills: | WS | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ I'm not aware of the effiency of theses weapons. But if you want to try them, it's the only way to get one... All the parts needed in theses recipes (except the Sealed Receptacles, of course) are available in the Ranged Weapons Components Shop.
